Package de.ralleytn.simple.audio

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Audio
    Interface containing all the methods a good audio implementation should have.
    RecordingListener
    Listens to a Recorder.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractAudio
    Implements the Audio and should be extended by all classes representing a form of playable audio.
    BufferedAudio
    Reads the entire audio data into the RAM.
    Recorder
    Records audio from an input device.
    StreamedAudio
    Never loads the entire audio data into the RAM.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FileFormat
    Represents a file format for audio files.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AudioException
    Is thrown when an error inside of SimpleAudio happens.
